languages.text: "Скажи, ты хотя бы раскаиваешься? Крови невинных на твоих руках можно было бы избежать, не действуй ты бездумно".

traits.locale_text: "Скажи, ты хотя бы раскаиваешься? Крови невинных на твоих руках можно было бы избежать, не действуй ты бездумно".

languages.text: "Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you not acted on impulse."
languages.original_text: "Скажи, ты хотя бы раскаиваешься? Крови невинных на твоих руках можно было бы избежать, не действуй ты бездумно".

traits.locale_text: "Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you stopped to think before acting."
"Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you stopped to think before acting."
"Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you not acted on impulse."
"Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you not acted on impulse."
"Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you not acted on impulse."
"Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you not acted on impulse."

languages.text: 「自分のしたことを後悔しているのか？衝動的なものでなければ、あなたの手が罪のない人々の血にまみれることはなかっただろう」
languages.original_text: "Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you not acted on impulse."

traits.locale_text: 「自分のしたことを後悔しているのか？衝動的なものでなければ、あなたの手が罪のない人々の血にまみれることはなかっただろう」

languages.text: “你对你的所作所为有没有一丝悔意？如果当时你没那么冲动，你的双手就不会沾满无辜之人的鲜血。”
languages.original_text: "Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you not acted on impulse."

traits.locale_text: “你对你的所作所为有没有一丝悔意？如果当时你没那么冲动，你的双手就不会沾满无辜之人的鲜血。”

languages.text: «¿Se arrepiente al menos de hacer lo que hizo? Sus manos no estarían cubiertas de sangre de inocentes si no hubiera actuado por impulso».
languages.original_text: "Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you not acted on impulse."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se arrepiente al menos de hacer lo que hizo? Sus manos no estarían cubiertas de sangre de inocentes si no hubiera actuado por impulso».

languages.text: "Bereut Ihr wenigstens, was Ihr getan habt? Eure Hände wären nicht mit dem Blut von Unschuldigen befleckt, hättet Ihr nicht so impulsiv gehandelt."
languages.original_text: "Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you not acted on impulse."

traits.locale_text: "Bereut Ihr wenigstens, was Ihr getan habt? Eure Hände wären nicht mit dem Blut von Unschuldigen befleckt, hättet Ihr nicht so impulsiv gehandelt."

languages.text: « Est-ce qu'au moins, vous regrettez votre geste ? Si vous n'aviez pas agi sous le coup de l'émotion, vos mains ne seraient pas couvertes du sang des innocents. »
languages.original_text: "Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you not acted on impulse."

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce qu'au moins, vous regrettez votre geste ? Si vous n'aviez pas agi sous le coup de l'émotion, vos mains ne seraient pas couvertes du sang des innocents. »

languages.text: "Hiç değilse pişman mısın? Aceleci davranmasan masumların kanı ellerine bulaşmazdı."
languages.original_text: "Do you at least regret doing what you did? Your hands would not be covered in the blood of innocents had you not acted on impulse."

traits.locale_text: "Hiç değilse pişman mısın? Aceleci davranmasan masumların kanı ellerine bulaşmazdı."
